trans-unit.source: Enumerates the values of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisWord" name="EmphasisWord" href=""></xref> for a specific <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os valores de <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisWord" name="EmphasisWord" href=""> </xref> para um determinado <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The word emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: A ênfase word está definida para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>instâncias por meio da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objeto retornado pela <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>propriedade em uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render emphasis; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: Cada mecanismo de fala sintético é livre para determinar como processar ênfase; a natureza da ênfase difere entre idiomas, dialetos, gêneros ou vozes.

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisWord and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os EmphasisWord e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>podem ser usadas ao definir ou obter o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>em um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisWord are greater than or equal to zero, and the values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: Os dois valores podem ser diferenciados pelo fato de que os valores reais do EmphasisWord são maiores que ou igual a zero e os valores de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>são todos os menores do que zero; e usando o valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>propriedade em uma instância.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>

trans-unit.source: Indicates an engine-specific default level of emphasis.
trans-unit.target: Indica um nível específico de mecanismo padrão de ênfase.
Não indica que nenhuma ênfase especificado.
